name: Dragon Ball Devolution
summary: Relive the complete saga of Goku through this fighting game, faithfully reproducing the sequence of episodes of the famous Dragon Ball Z. DBZ Devolution is the result of the hard work of a French developer, passionate about the series. Graphics are rather simplistic (Gameboy type) but don't affect the richness of this game, who knows a great craze among connoisseurs. Learn to manage your Ki and create deadly Kamehameha!
